name: Sewer Shield
description: When you have nowhere else to turn and you need to protect yourself think of this hard foam Sewer Shield for post-apocalyptic epic battles. Although much lighter the realism in detail on this sewer shield looks so real that you will feel invincible. 52cm.

name: Riot Shield
description: Keep protesters and zombies from getting to you with this useful used latex riot shield. Though this shield has seen a fair share of battles it is far from retirement and can be used for several years defending its streets from the resistance. 90cm x 60cm.
